content: My crown came off while eating
I'm sorry to hear that! Can you tell me if you’re experiencing any pain or sensitivity in that area?
yes mild pain normally but severe pain whenever i try to eat or drink something
That sounds uncomfortable. Is the pain localized to the area where the crown came off, or are you feeling it in other teeth as well?
mainly in that tooth only , but slight pain also in nearby ones
I can help with dental appointment scheduling. Could you clarify your dental concern?
